topic.title: Actions Available at Table Level in Data Source Explorer View

body.p: The contextual menu of a Table node in the tree from the Data Source Explorer view contains the following actions:

dlentry.dd: Performs a refresh for the sub-tree of the selected node.
Opens the selected table in the Table Explorer view.
Opens the Export Criteria dialog box (a thorough description of this dialog box can be found in the Import from Database chapter) .
